name: Shankstars
description:
You've been chosen to assemble an elite team of golfers to conquer courses the likes of which this world has never seen. Tee off on your own or compete head-to-head against other players as you level up and unlock new characters, imaginative courses and increasingly epic adventures!

BUILD YOUR TEAM OF LEGENDARY GOLFERS
Conquering boldly designed courses requires the best of the best. There are no weak links here. Need to hit a power shot? Select your pirate – so strong that the sea surrendered to him. Sometimes accuracy is the name of the game... Tag in your astronaut for out-of-this-world precision. Each golfer has their own unique skills and special abilities to help your team shine.

HONE YOUR GOLFERS' SKILLS AND GUIDE THEM TO MASTERY
The more you play, the more you unlock for your golfers. Upgrade their abilities and equipment with collectible items on your journey to create a dream team.

CONQUER INCREDIBLE COURSES
A fearless squad like yours demands a challenge. Beyond the expected challenges of a golf course, reimagined hazards like active volcanoes, tornadoes, Turfkins (our sweet-looking but poorly behaved critters) and more, will keep you on your toes and put your abilities to the test.

TEE OFF SOLO OR GO HEAD-TO-HEAD
Choose to embark on an epic single-player campaign or go head-to-head against real-life combatants to see where you stack up against players around the world. Do you have what it takes to top the leaderboard? No matter what, if you aren't shanking your shots, you aren't trying!
